title: Gather Requirements
description: Conduct interviews and workshops with stakeholders to understand the requirements for the LeadershipBrandBuilder platform.

title: Design System Architecture - v1.0
description: Design the overall system architecture for version 1.0 of LeadershipBrandBuilder, including frontend, backend, and database components. Consider scalability, maintainability, performance, and security. Define high-level components, their interactions, data flow, and API design where necessary. Include a clear plan for versioning and updates, focusing on modularity and flexibility for future enhancements. For v1.0, prioritize core features and MVP (Minimum Viable Product) requirements.

title: Develop Frontend
description: Implement the user interface and frontend functionality for the LeadershipBrandBuilder platform.

title: Develop Backend
description: Implement the backend services and APIs for the LeadershipBrandBuilder platform.

title: Set up Database
description: Design and implement the database schema and infrastructure for the LeadershipBrandBuilder platform.

title: Implement Authentication and Authorization
description: Develop the authentication and authorization mechanisms for the LeadershipBrandBuilder platform.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Configure the CI/CD pipeline for automated testing, building, and deployment of the LeadershipBrandBuilder platform.

title: Write Documentation
description: Create user guides, technical documentation, and other supporting materials for the LeadershipBrandBuilder platform.

title: Conduct Testing
description: Perform various types of testing, including unit testing, integration testing, and end-to-end testing, to ensure the quality of the LeadershipBrandBuilder platform.
